programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Party) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Party»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Couac dans la Vallée de l'Harmonie) S6 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Couac dans la Vallée de l'Harmonie»Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !) S1 (1/17)
programme.desc: «Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !»Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale»Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Sidekick Switcheroo) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Sidekick Switcheroo»During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Super requin) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super requin»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Daddy Shack) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Daddy Shack»After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu»Mayor Humdinger wants all of Farmer Yumi's honey, but that also brings him a bucket full of bees. Chickaletta goes missing and the Paw Patrol eventually finds her back at the beach.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington chez le médecin) S2 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington chez le médecin»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (n°49)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme) S6 (7/26)
programme.desc: «La guitare de Gustavo / Yoga à la ferme»Gustavo comes to play the guitar during the campfire concert. Mayor Humdinger also wants to give a concert and is looking for a way to make beautiful music. Yumi's baby goats enter the yoga class and this is how the idea of ??goat yoga arises.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Land Pirates) S6 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Land Pirates»Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and get lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (n°213)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice»Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Ma petite dent / La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Ma petite dent / La bestiole baveuse»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sleeping Like a Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (n°37)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Circus Celebration) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Circus Celebration»Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dauphin à bord) S7 (6/7)
programme.desc: «Dauphin à bord»When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger) S6 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger»An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina) S6 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina»Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (n°214)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava»Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Grand-père apprend à Peppa à jardiner. Elle plante des graines et quelques mois plus tard, des fraises ont poussé. George, lui, veut faire pousser des dinosaures...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !) S1 (1/17)
programme.desc: «Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !»Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale»Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.desc: «Sidekick Switcheroo»During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.desc: «Super requin»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.desc: «Daddy Shack»After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu) S6 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Le miel a disparu / A la recherche du sac perdu»Mayor Humdinger wants all of Farmer Yumi's honey, but that also brings him a bucket full of bees. Chickaletta goes missing and the Paw Patrol eventually finds her back at the beach.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington chez le médecin) S2 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington chez le médecin»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (n°53)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (n°54)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan) S7 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan»Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Requin / La Forêt de Varech»Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (n°38)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (n°57)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special "dinosaur" juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Peppa et George s'occupent de Polly le perroquet en l'absence de leurs grands-parents, en vacances. Mais Polly profite de ce que les enfants sont partis chercher une glace pour prendre la poudre d'escampette...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La grande course de Pizza) S6 (24/24)
programme.desc: «La grande course de Pizza»It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Megabot) S6 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Megabot»Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta) S6 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Le réveil du Géant-Panzé / L'oeuf de Galinetta»The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out! // Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes) S7 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes»When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!
